data.title: Analyst Warns Ethereum Could Drop Further as U.S.-China Trade Tensions Escalate
data.description:
Donald Trump’s latest tariff measures targeting China and other nations triggered a sharp drop in Bitcoin and altcoins, though markets partially rebounded afterward.
The post Analyst Warns Ethereum Could Drop Further as U.S.-China Trade Tensions Escalate appeared first on Cryptodnes.
source: https://cryptodnes.bg/en/analyst-warns-ethereum-could-drop-further-as-u-s-china-trade-tensions-escalate/

data.title: Paxos acquires Electronic Money Institution license for the EU, aims to bring compliant stablecoins
data.description:
Paxos acquired fully accredited EU-based Membrane Finance, granting it a MiCA-compliant toolset for tokenized assets and stablecoins.
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/paxos-acquires-electronic-money-institution-license-for-the-eu-aims-to-bring-compliant-stablecoins/

data.title: Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, Popcat Have Corrected Multiple Times And Bounced Back, D.O.G.E Set To Do The Same, Trader Argues
data.description:
According to a prominent trader, the Department Of Government Efficiency (D.O.G.E) token is following the typical meme coin trajectory—major rallies followed by deep corrections.  

source: https://www.benzinga.com/markets/cryptocurrency/25/02/43474596/dogecoin-shiba-inu-popcat-have-corrected-multiple-times-and-bounced-back-doge-set-to-do-th?utm_source=cryptopanic.com&utm_campaign=partner_feed&utm_medium=partner_feed&utm_content=site

data.description:

source: https://dailyhodl.com/2025/02/04/here-are-four-altcoins-from-sector-that-will-be-trend-for-the-year-according-to-veteran-trader/

data.title: Neptune adds 20 BTC to Bitcoin strategy, also buys 1m DOGE
data.description:
Canadian blockchain firm Neptune Digital Assets announced it purchased 20 BTC worth almost $2 million. The company also bought Dogecoin, scooping the meme coin on December 27, 2024 at the average price of $0.37 per DOGE. Neptune Digital Assets, a Canada-based blockchain firm, has announced it added 20 Bitcoin (BTC) to its holdings. The publicly-traded […]
The post Neptune adds 20 BTC to...
source: https://coinjournal.net/news/neptune-adds-20-btc-to-bitcoin-strategy-also-buys-1m-doge/

data.title: The Daily: Dogecoin draws further public company interest, bitcoin lingers below $100,000 as China plans retaliatory tariffs in response to Trump and more

data.title: FTX’s Bahamas arm to repay first creditor group starting on Feb. 18
data.description:
A distribution notice from FTX Digital Markets showed that the initial group of claimants could expect the value of their funds to be returned plus interest.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/ftx-bahamas-repay-creditors-february?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: Senator Bill Hagerty pushes for stablecoin regulatory framework
data.description:
Senator Bill Hagerty intends to introduce legislation on Feb. 4 to establish a regulatory framework for stablecoins, Bloomberg News reported. The bill — dubbed the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act — will outline provisions for issuing stablecoin payments and mandate that they be backed by US currency, Federal Reserve notes, […]
The post Senator Bill...
source: https://cryptoslate.com/senator-bill-hagerty-pushes-for-stablecoin-regulatory-framework/

data.title: FTX Repayments Will Start In Next 2 Weeks After Long Wait
data.description:
FTX repayments will start on February 18, 2025, beginning with claims under $50,000 for those in the Bahamas process.
source: https://coincu.com/305306-ftx-repayments-will-start-in-next-2-weeks
